entry.def: An alcoholic is someone who cannot stop drinking large amounts of alcohol, even when this is making them ill.

example.ex: He showed great courage by admitting that he is an alcoholic.
example.tran: 他以极大的勇气承认自己酗酒。

entry.def: Alcoholic drinks are drinks that contain alcohol.

means.word_mean: 1. a person who drinks alcohol to excess habitually

sentences.sentence: "alcoholic expatriates in Paris"- Carl Van Doren

jushi.english: This restaurant does not serve alcoholic beverages.
